main event: Brazilian military personnel observed strange objects resembling a stellar plane in the sky above Salvador, Brazil, on December 6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting was made by both officers and enlisted personnel at the regional headquarters., Major Osmar Soares Dutra used binoculars to examine the objects and concluded they were not known planets., The objects were described as immense and stationary at times., The phenomenon involved objects that divided into four parts before moving towards the east., A journalist present at the sighting was the only individual authorized to speak to the press about the incident.
sighted object: strange objects in the sky resembling a stellar plane
witness description: Brazilian military officers and enlisted personnel
